评论概述: Nice to have protection of one's credit/debit cards.
评论详情: What concerns me is that the money clip is on the outside. The storage capacity of business cards or reward cards is limited. As per the advice of a former chiropractor I keep my wallet in my front pocket, in order to keep my spine  in alignment. Like the compact feel.
Muy buen producto

评论概述: Great wallet, 4 stars for quality and has held up good.  - Clip in on the wrong end
评论详情: This would be a five star wallet if the clip was on the other end.  If you put your wallet in your front pocket, it is good to put the rounded edge down.  The wallet slides into your pocket with the rounded edge better.  With this wallet, the clip catches your pocket on the way down, or pushes against your leg and leaves a mark on your skin.
It was good for about 3 months but now it's coming unglued and falling apart. I looked for a way to contact the company but I can't find any way to contact them.

I have only had this wallet a short time so far I love it.  It does all it claims to do. It’s thin , well made and holds every thing I need it to hold . The reason I purchased this wallet was my previous thick wallet that I carried in my back pocket was breaking my credit cards. This wallet keeps the credit cards nice and flat and is thin enough to carry in a front pocket. I like to read all the reviews when I purchase something . To the person who gave it three stars because he didn’t like the “belt “ clip it is a money clip and it works as advertised. This wallet is not inexpensive but for me it is well worth the money. I don’t like to have to replaced damaged credit cards. The one thing I cannot address in this review is longevity. I think by carrying it in a front pocket and not sitting on it the wallet should last a long time . It comes with a lifetime warranty in the box.

评论概述: Sturdy, spacious, functional, discreet, and convenient
评论详情: I've had this wallet for over two years and it is still working for me!  The main card holder, while marketed to hold 6 cards in its card slots, is holding 7 cards for me; the ID holder slot holds an additional 3 cards; and the external card slots hold another 3. As a result, my wallet holds 13 cards.  I did not like the money clip so I did remove it (easily detached with the screwdriver that came with the wallet).  If ever this wallet breaks (probably not going to for a while) I would definitely buy the same model as a replacement.

I got this as a gift for someone and they really love it. Says it’s easy to use and one of the best wallets they’ve gotten. They’ve been using it for a month now and it’s held up pretty well. Well worth the buy.

I love this new wallet. It has to be the best wallet I have owned in years. It is easy to use and keeps essential/frequently used cards readily available. As you can tell, I am delighted with this wallet. I highly recommend it to anyone in the market.
Great wallet but not holding up well brim around the leather fell off. Wallet is still together for now.
4 star because I want to give it time to fail me. But so far I like it.

评论概述: Cool idea, but tears up cards placed in the pockets.
评论详情: I love the look and quality of the material. The ejector pocket works great. But the design on the other pockets allow friction to immediately begin peeling the protective layer from cards or IDs. I would give it 5 stars if not for that. Also, the belt clip attachment seems unnecessary and just digs into your leg or wears against your pocket. If you don’t plan on wearing it clipped on your belt, I would recommend taking it off (it can be removed if you have a tiny Allen set).
My husband loves this wallet so much! He had a different wallet that was huge and loves how compact this is.
High quality leather and metal!!!

I purchased this wallet in December of 2023 and loved the function of this thing. It reduced the sized of what I was carrying in my pocket.  The plastic protector for the ID cover broke last month so I reached out to the manufacture. They sent a replacement within a week. Couldn't ask for better customer service.
Just as described.  Love it

评论概述: Hardside wallet was not a hit
评论详情: I bought this hard side security wallet as a gift for my husband, in hopes of keeping everything safe. However, he does not use it. A hard side wallet is difficult to get used to if you’re used to having a soft leather wallet.

First new wallet in 10+ years and decided to try a minimalist one! This product seems to have quality structure. I’m sure the leather parts will loosen over time, but the metal parts feel durable. The magnet holds the fold securely. The card storage holds them secured and the trigger is smooth; very easy to use. The money clip can be removed with the provided tool for an even slimmer fit. This is great for someone that doesn’t carry a lot!
I bought this wallet as a gift for my husband and he loved it!
Perfect
Got it for my husband for Christmas and he likes it. The downside is that it must be full of cards because if it isn't they will fall out. Other than that it's a good wallet.
I haven’t had a chance to use it yet, but It is exactly as advertised. Seems very durable and looks really classy. On top of that, it came on time!
I love it bought my son in law one for Christmas and then my fiancé wanted one. Would love one made this way for woman.
Very impressed, nice and compact

I didn’t expect the quality of a Ridge or something analogous given the price point but went with this as a replacement wallet. Should’ve stuck to the age old adage you get what you pay for. This thing rattles bad. When I walk and it’s in my pocket it rattles. It rattles when I take it out. It rattles and when I’m extracting cards. I’m surprised it doesn’t rattle sitting still on the dresser. It’s also HUGE. This thing is a tank. Not a slim design at all. But, it does eject the cards as advertised and fit everything I need in it, so it does “work.” However, definitely disappointed with the lack of quality.

I bought this for my husband before Christmas, only issue we had that I now had to replace it a few months later.  He has medical alert id card that is metal and it caused issues in the slide up on is credit cards. I don't know if that makes sense. But I bought him another one cause he loves it but hopefully we can fit the medical alert card in the bifold part. Fingers crossed 🤞

Wallet is a quality product. Pleased with the construction and durability. Very pleased with this purchase. Other designs were not as substantial as this model. Lifetime warranty was an added bonus!

I love how it cut my old wallet in half and carried so much in it. It is not the slimmest, but slim compared to other wallets. Very durable and strong. The wallet design is cool and simple to use. I have had it for awhile and never faced any issues with it

评论概述: Quality seems very good at first glance

Absolutely love the design. Great for what I need in a wallet. If your like me when you have a normal wallet you tend to end up with a bunch of useless cards and receipts. When I saw this wallet I instantly knew this would be the wallet for me. The care hold says it can only hold 6 cards I actually have 7 comfortably in and the button still functions. The wallet took some getting used to, not a true bifold. The "pockets" are tight so nothing falls out. I was not used to using a money clip, but I have adapted to it. I also keep my reciepts under the clip as well. I don't worry about losing a credit card due to a wallet failure any longer. I like the fact I can carry it in any front pocket as well.

评论概述: I can't say it's better than a normal wallet, but I like the engineering.
评论详情: It's so much better than the stupid ridge wallet design. It has clever engineering and useful pockets, and it still stays relatively slim. The downside is that normal leather wallets can hold just as many cards, as well as some cash, about as easily. This really struggles with cash. The reason that matters is that cash is mostly the reason normal wallets are bulky; you take the cash out, and they become pretty slim. I do like this product, though. It's just not the life-changing innovation or quality that would warrant an instant switch from my old leather wallet.

I have purchased many of these smaller minimalist wallets. This is by far the best. Quality assembly. Screws to hold the case together. The card holder works flawlessly. I have eight cards in the card holder easily. It holds everything I need. And has room for more cards still. The money clip holds paper bills great and securely. I’m buying another one of these before they disappear. Love this wallet. Took forever to finally find the BEST one!
